Tianyi Cai | Home

I am an Applied Scientist on the Retail Trading team at Coinbase. Prior to my current role, I worked at:

  • Waymo (previously the Google Self-Driving Car Project)
  • Meta (née Facebook)
  • Uber
  • BitSight

I have a PhD in Biostatistics from Harvard University, and a Bachelor of Mathematics from the University of Waterloo.

Thanks for visiting! Send me an email if you would like to talk.
